tag_list: "Monsieur Adi" EP Praeludium "Fire Fire Fire" Blood "Last Stand" Requiem "In Caelis"
description:
L’EP tant attendu “Fire Fire Fire” de Monsieur Adi (Paris, France) est enfin prêt et sera disponible sur les principales plates-formes de vente digitale du monde entier le 20 février via son label Technofavrik.

Monsieur Adi plonge directement au coeur de son épopée / premier album “Empire” avec cet EP de 6 pistes en captant l'atmosphère dystopique de la chute de l’Empire Romain. En mêlant la grandeur de ses compositions baroques avec sa touche électronique sophistiquée indéniable, Adi a magistralement créé une grande symphonie des temps modernes empreinte d’une intense émotion. “Fire Fire Fire”, “Blood”, et “Last Stand” (en collaboration avec le chanteur/compositeur britannique Gary Go) sont débordantes d'énergie et clairement calibrées pour les clubs, tandis que d’autres pistes s’inscrivent dans un registre plus sombre et poignant, à l’image de “Requiem” (écrit en hommage à sa mère décédée) et “In Caelis”. 

Monsieur Adi est le maestro de son temps qui a su manier l'art de la mélodie, la texture, l'humeur, et le mouvement pour créer un magnifique opus. Cet EP n’est que le prologue de l’album “Empire” à venir.

1. Praeludium
2. Fire Fire Fire
3. Blood
4. Last Stand (feat. Gary Go)
5. Requieum
6. In Caelis
title: Fire Fire Fire - EP (OUT NOW)

description: Remixing Justice is something that should have happened some time ago, but the right song and timing had to be. I love this song very much. My interpretation of this song is about pride and love for somewhere and all that's there which I wanted to capture in something that's moving. Keeping it simple with yet dramatic, this remix builds from the vocals into a slow électronique / soft rock ballad with strings, choirs, and some synth pads. There's also the guitar solo which I have always loved. Making this remix and listening to it reminds me how much I love Paris. I always will. Enjoy !
title: Justice - Ohio (Monsieur Adi Remix)

tag_list: "Monsieur Adi" Blood "Fire Fire Fire" EP Technofavrik
title: Blood

description: Five remixes over the course of five months for one woman. This project would never have started if there was not a sincere respect for her and her music. I decided to finish with the song « Beautiful Stranger » as the lyrics are wonderful and I wanted to make a beautiful remix to match them by putting my orchestral training to use a little more. Starting at a quiet place with pizzicato cello and building with each orchestral section coming in, the remix builds until an interlude, only to hit its first high point with a different kind of drumming pattern. The synth works and more instruments come in until the choir begins to sing hitting an epic crescendo. Dramatic ? Yes. But would I have it any other way ? No. Here's the product and enjoy your listen ! Also, you can download all five remixes in a little EP titled "Version" right here : http://www.mediafire.com/?g1of275ak3628bz
title: Madonna - Beautiful Stranger (Monsieur Adi Remix)

description: To compliment the release of the Fire Fire Fire single, an amazing remix has been created by Blue Satellite. This remix captures the energy of the original and gives it even more energy. It is ready for the dancefloor and ready for your ears. Out on 3 Oct on Technofavrik !
title: Fire Fire Fire (Blue Satellite Remix)

description: « Fire Fire Fire » is the new single taken from the upcoming « Fire Fire Fire » EP of Monsieur Adi. « Fire Fire Fire » is an epic and powerful piece of layered électro and rock featuring a pumping beat and crisp synths backing a soaring and catchy dual electric guitar hook that takes the song to a new level for the dancefloor, while fireballs blazing through the night sky can be heard in the background. With its cinematic flair, « Fire Fire Fire » gives a hint of what to expect on the EP and the début album « Empire » (releasing 2012).
title: Fire Fire Fire (Radio Edit)

description: We're in a different territory. I wanted to capture eroticism in its purest form ... something tribal, dark, raw, dramatic, spiritual, and celebratory at once. The remix builds over a danceable tribal beat until it works into a huge chorus with blasting brass and twinkling synths while using a choir in a different way to provide added texture. And obviously I like a little bit of cinematic drama. So close your eyes and visualise.
title: Madonna - Erotica (Monsieur Adi Remix)

description: The final remix of this trilogy is one of Frozen. It is such an iconic song of Madonna that really first made me notice Madonna. The delicacy, fragility, and darkness of the song matched with the video really left a mark on me. Just last year I have lost my mother which was the hardest thing I have ever experienced in my life ; I don't believe anything else could hurt me as much as that. After it, I suppose I became a little "Frozen" creatively and emotionally, but recently I've just started to release and return to my old self. I wanted to keep with the spiritual aspect of the song and not do too much. The remix builds in and on itself with a tribal beat, french horns, a cathedral organ, synths, and a choir to back Madonna. It's been fantastic working with her voice ! Here is the product !
title: Madonna - Frozen (Monsieur Adi Remix)

description: This is the second remix of Madonna I've planned to create and it is of her popular track "Music" which was produced by Mirwais, who happens to be one of my huge influences. I was lucky enough to find some what sounded like some rough vocals ! I have an obsession with musical textures and in contrast to the remix of Get Together with it's warmth and tenderness, I wanted to do my take on "Acid Rock" and create something hard, strong, and danceable - a little edge in fact. In this remix I've placed some strong beats, filtered synths, an electric guitar line, and some extra vocoder work to back Madonna. And I added the clip of "Celebration" simply because Madonna sounds cool when she talks - I like it. The response to the Get Together was surprisingly and mostly positive from the Madonna's fans. At the end of the day, I'm just a fan also that's making music I would like to hear Madonna make. It's done completely from respect and I am anticipating her return !
title: Madonna - Music (Monsieur Adi Remix)

description: Slightly instrumental version of the "Music" remix.
title: Madonna - Music (Monsieur Adi Remix) [Dub Version]

description: A friend surprised me with the vocals to one of my favourite songs of Madonna - "Get Together." When I first heard it, I liked because it had the similar sound of "Music Sounds Better With You" by Stardust and has since been a reference for sonority. I put the song at a much slower pace to enhance the sensuality of the vocals and kept the warmth. It's impossible for me to not go a little dramatic, though. Here is the product !
title: Madonna - Get Together (Monsieur Adi Remix)
